Sentencas: Intensive CFD calculations are performed for the flow distribution in planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks with different number of cells.
Titulo: A key geometric parameter for the flow uniformity in planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The calculations are based on 3D models with realistic geometric and operational parameters.
Titulo: A key geometric parameter for the flow uniformity in planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The effects of design parameters, such as the channel height and length, the height of the repeating cell unit and the manifold width, on the flow uniformity are examined.
Titulo: A key geometric parameter for the flow uniformity in planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The CFD results demonstrate that the ratio of the outlet manifold width to the inlet manifold width (a) is a key design parameter that affects the flow uniformity.
Titulo: A key geometric parameter for the flow uniformity in planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The physical origin for the effect of a on the flow distribution is discussed and a simplified 2D model with the critical details of the flow physics is developed.
Titulo: A key geometric parameter for the flow uniformity in planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The 2D model provides quality result for the optimal value of a and is easy to use for the broad engineering society.
Titulo: A key geometric parameter for the flow uniformity in planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks
